entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
